Enter a Battle Trance that lasts until the end of your next turn.
You gain a protective shield around you which absorbs up to Your Might + Your Level physical damage.
When Battle Trance ends, heal for 2d6, and the shield fades.
<Battle Trance>.Notes: You can activate this as a Reaction when you would take damage.

~Marksmanship~.Effect: YOU can flank a target from up to 6 meters away (if you, the target and the ally/wall/obstacle are on the same line).
~Marksmanship~.Notes: As usual, that wall/obstacle/ally helping with your flank must right behind the target (meaning allies can't flank an enemy with you being 6 meters away).

~Reload~.Effect:
Once per turn, you get some damage modifiers to your first attack, depending on the current round:
Your first regular weapon attack in an encounter deals +1 damage.
Your second regular weapon attack in the encounter deals +1d6 damage.
Your third regular weapon attack and all upcoming ones in the encounter deal -5 damage.
You can spend 1 Mana and 0 Actions to 'reset' this Ability to its original state.

~Point Mark~.Effect:
Mark a point on the ground.
Allies and you can use the mark to flank targets.

<Recoil Shot>.Effect:
Dash up to 2 meters away from the target.
Push the target 2 meters away. It takes 1d8 Damage if it collides with something.
<Recoil Shot>.Notes: This does not trigger attacks of oportunity.

<Harpoon>.Effect:
Make a ranged attack that deals 2d12 + Main Stat damage (against Defense).
The target makes a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, it is pulled to you.
Otherwise, you are pulled to it.
<Harpoon>.Notes: Requires a Harpoon, which can be bought for 50 Gold.

<Precise Weapon>.Effect:
Choose any weapon and make it Precise.
The weapon's scaling becomes +4 instead of scaling with a Stat.
The wielder of the weapon is also immune to Cripple and has +1 Movement Speed.
Making another weapon Precise makes the previous back to how it was.

<Ground Aim Lock>.Effect:
Your first attack every turn while Prone deals +1d6 damage.
You can go prone for 0 Actions on your turn.

<Scatterblast>.Effect:
Make an attack on a target for 3d8 + Main Stat Smash damage.
The impact is so powerful that all units within 3 meters of the target take the final damage taken by the target directly (not against Defense).
This attack is affected by your Reload state.

~Proficiency in Sight~.Effect: Add your Level to all Wisdom Checks for seeing (e.g. noticing things in darkness, seeing far away objects, recognizing faces, etc).

~Skipper~.Effect:
You can freely jump up to 3 meters in length and height (still uses 3 meters of your movement speed).
Doing this allows you to freely jump over small obstacles, gaps, etc without having to roll.
~Skipper~.Notes:
If playing with grid, you can jump over 2 squares and land in the next one.
You can jump over enemies, but you still trigger opportunity attacks.

~Herbivore~.Effect:
You have +3 Reserve Health, and half of your meals can consist of grass and leaves, but...
...you can not eat meat and you take 150% damage from Poison.
If you eat meat, you take take 1d12 Damage and become Exhausted for 1 hour.

~Fleet Footed~.Effect: You are immune to Slows, and getting up from being Prone only takes 2 Meters.

~Know Thy Enemy~.Effect: Your gain +2 Spell Grade when making Units roll Dexterity or Might Combat Checks.

~Proficiency in Persuasion~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for persuading people non-agressively (convincing them through dialogue).

~Proficiency in Memory~.Effect: Add your Level to all Intelligence Checks for remembering details about people, locations, events, etc that you were personally involved with.

~Alignment~.Effect:
Determine the true personality alignment of your character.
Choose if you are Evil, Neutral or Virtuous. Your other Abilities and Racial Ability choice must reflect your alignment.
If your alignment changes throughout the adventure, your traits will automatically change to reflect your alignment.
~Alignment~.Notes: The GM decides if your alignment has changed based on your actions and character development.

~Demonic Ancestry~.Effect:
You can use Charisma as your Main Stat regardless of what your Class says your Main Stat should be.
You can safely consume 2 Potions within 1 hour without risking overdose.
You can not consume cooked food. If you are Virtuous, you can eat only raw vegetables and plants; if you are Evil, you can eat only raw meat; if you are Neutral, you can eat either.

~Davel Stare~.Effect: A target must pass a Wisdom Check or be Charmed if you are Virtuous, Dazed if you are Neutral or Feared if you are Evil.

~Gift of Evil~.Effect: Deal 1d10 True Damage to a Unit.

~Neutral Feat~.Effect:
You have a free Feat.
If your alignment ever changes, you lose that Feat.
~Neutral Feat~.Notes: You gain the Feat back if you regain this Talent (the same Feat - you can not change the Feat).

~Proficiency in Intimidation~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for intimidating non-player characters into changing their mind, submission, etc.

~Draconic Ancestry~.Effect:
When creating your character, choose any element from Acid, Cold, Fire, Shock, Force, Poison and Necrotic.
That becomes your Dragonborn Element.
~Draconic Ancestry~.Notes: The color of your skin and scales as a Dragonborn should reflect the element you chose (e.g. Cold might be associated with white or blue Dragonborns).

~Dragonborn Resistance~.Effect: You take only 50% Damage from your Dragonborn Element type.

~Dragon's Breath~.Effect:
Breathe your Dragonborn Element in a 3x1 meter line.
Make an attack against all Units caught in your breath.
The attack deals 2d6 + your class's Main Stat damage of your Dragonborn Element (against their Defense).
~Dragon's Breath~.Upgrade: At Levels 3, 6 and 9, you get one extra use of Dragon's Breath per Long Rest (e.g. the Cooldown becomes 2 times / Long Rest, 3 times / Long Rest, etc).

~Breath - Cone~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 3 meter, 90* cone.

~Breath - Line~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 4x2 meter line.

~Breath - Blast~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes on all creatures within 2 meters of you instead of a line.

~Proficiency in Crafting~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for crafting items (e.g. improvised traps, weapons or tools, rafts, structures, setting up a tent, etc).

~Proficiency in History~.Effect: Add your Level to all Intelligence Checks for recalling past events from the lore of the world (e.g. wars, events, etc).

~Dwarf Resting~.Effect:
You need 12 hours of sleep instead of 8 per day to function normally.
Your movement speed can't be reduced below 4 meters by Crowd Control or Armor.
~Dwarf Resting~.Notes:
Your speed not being able to be reduced applies to being Slowed, Dazed and Feared. You are not immune to Roots.
Hard Terrain still takes 2 meters of movement for 1 meter of Hard Terrain.
You use the standard rules for Exhaustion if you spend more than 24 hours without sleeping.

~Guns 'n' Hammers~.Effect: You can use Hand Hammers, Warhammers and Heavy Guns normally as if you were Trained in them.

~Stone-Like Bones~.Effect:
Your bones are tough as rock.
You only take 50% damage from falling and from traps that deal physical damage.
Your Reserve Health pool increases by 5.

~Runesmith~.Effect:
You permanently know 2 Generic Abilities from the Arcane or Conjuration spell lists.
You gain Proficiency in Arcana (see Proficiencies).

~Meditation~.Effect:
As an Elf, your sleep is more akin to meditation and you only need 4 hours of sleep per night.
Elves don't dream and can still hear and smell while sleeping, but at a lower responsiveness.

~The Blade Dance~.Effect: When you land the killing strike on a Worthy Enemy, you reset your movement this turn and don't provoke attacks of oportunity this turn (and you can continue your Movement).

~Arcane Veins~.Effect:
You gain access to the Arcane Spell School, no matter what class you are.
Instead of Dexterity of Might, you can use your Main Stat for attacking with weapons.

~Lithe~.Effect: While below 50% Health, you are immune to Fleeing and you can Break your Movement into as many parts as you want.
~Lithe~.Notes:
Fleeing is when you move away from an enemy's melee attack range; if you are Fleeing, all your actions have Cover.
Breaking your Movement means you can Move, do an Action, then continue your Movement.

~Proficiency in Luck~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for luck and random chance (e.g. a merchant having a certain item, gambling, etc).

~Proficiency in Investigation~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for closely examining small to medium objects or inspecting parts of rooms.

~Inherited Tastes~.Effect: You don't have a sense of taste, but your eyes perceive colors sharper than other races.

~Lucky Presence~.Effect: After another Unit you can see of you makes a roll, you can force them to reroll one die once and keep the new result.

~Catch Me If You Can~.Effect:
This turn you don't trigger attacks of oportunity.
You can do this once per Long Rest.
Also, passively, your movement speed increases by 1 meter.

~Oh, My Tongue!~.Effect:
You now have a sense of taste. Congratulations!
You can detect whether something is poisonous by licking it without being affected by that poison.
You have 50% resistance to Acid and Poison.

<Out of Body Release>.Effect:
Your soul temporarily exits your body, leaving your body motionless to the ground.
While outside your body, the soul can't do anything except perceive.
You can return to your body for 0 Actions on your turn.
While outside your body, you have +3 on Perception, Stealth and Luck.
If more than 1 minute outside the body passes, your soul instantly re-enters the body.

<Kindled>.Effect:
You are no longer vulnerable to Fire damage.
After every worthy combat encounter, if your health is below 25% and you are conscious, heal back to 25% Health.

<Painless Revenge>.Effect:
Choose an enemy near you.
That enemy performs an attack on you.
If you survive the attack, you gain 1 Action which you can use to attack or cast spells on that enemy.

~Undeath~.Effect:
You have Advantage to rolls against Diseases.
You take 150% Damage from Fire and attacks done with silver weapons.
You do not require food to survive, but you do require 8 hours of sleep per day and water.
You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour.
You can stay Fallen for up to 7 days before dying for good.
You are considered Undead.

~Valiant~.Effect:
When you drop to or below 0 Health, you can still take your next turn without penalty and your Health remains 0.
After your next turn, if your Health is 0 or less, you Fall.
You also Fall in that time if you take damage again (and your Health can thus go below 0).

~Sense Souls~.Effect: You know the locations of any living creatures within 15 meters that are not obstructed by thick materials.
~Sense Souls~.Notes: The more obstructed the space between you and living creatures is, the fainter you feel it. 1 meter of obstruction completely hides the creatures.

~Beating Heart~.Effect:
You slow down the decaying of your body and increase your life span by up to 100 years.
You can stay unconscious for up to 1 week before dying.
Your maximum health also increases by 3.

~Human Vigilence~.Effect: Whenever you make a Check (before the roll), instead of rolling, you can automatically take the number 5 for the die (as if you rolled 5) for that Check.

~Talented~.Effect: You start with Training in any 2 Weapon Categories or Proficiencies (or one of each).
~Talented~.Notes: Weapon Categories are 1-Handed Melee Weapons, Shields, 2-Handed Ranged Weapons, etc.

~Human Diversity~.Effect:
Humans don't get a racial Ability choice.
Instead, choose any other Race except Dragonborn and Davel.
Gain one of its racial Ability choices (one of the "Choose One From..." Abilities).
~Human Diversity~.Upgrade: Alternatively, you can get a Feat instead.

~Proficiency in Monstrology~.Effect: Add your Level to all Checks for identifying monsters and Units and knowing what they do and how they behave.

~Boiling Blood~.Effect:
Use after you land an attack.
Increase the dice Damage of the attack by 50%.
~Boiling Blood~.Notes:
Extra Abilities over that attack are not increased (e.g. Smite). Only increase the total numbers on the dice by 50%, rounded down.
Also note that this can only be used on attacks, not on direct damage or Abilities that require a Check. Anything that specifies it's an 'attack' counts.

~Battle Anguish~.Effect:
You do not suffer Exhaustion penalties when you are healed and raise from being Fallen in combat.
However, after the first time you fall in combat, you can no longer use Abilities that Heal or cost 0 Actions (for the rest of this combat).

~Fierceness~.Effect: You can use any weapon with your Might Stat (instead of Dexterity, in some cases).

~Adaptability~.Effect: You can have Might as your class's Main Stat, even if your class says otherwise.
